amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on the security and protection of Iranian dissidents living in Camp Liberty, Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1974 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1974 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4263-4270) To express the sense of Congress on the security and protection of Iranian dissidents living in Camp Liberty, Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1974 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 1463.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1974 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
